Koga Shuko/Serpentor/Unitron/Hades/Anubis:


Koga Shuko fell back as a few autogun shots hit him, but he fired a bolt from 
his laser at an autogun nonetheless.

---

Serpentor laughed, raising his plasma launcher, firing a powerful blast at 
the Ark.

---

Anubis raised his missile launcher, launching a rocket off  at the Ark's 
giant form.

---

Hades fired three bolts from his laser rifle at the Ark.

---

Unitron fired two emerald optic blasts, followed up by three laser bolts from 
each rifle (six in all), all the shots headin' sraight for th' Ark.
